trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin assassin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The goblin assassin deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the goblin assassin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the goblin assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin assassin makes two attacks with its daggers or one shortbow attack.

trait.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage in melee, or 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage at range.
A trained killer of the goblin race, both in ranged and melee combat. It is able to set up ambushes and swiftly get rid of its enemies.
